text:
@RandPaul You are proof that COVID19 melts brain cells, but you ARE you so you lacked them on day 1.

"Someone needs to take a step back here." THAT WOULD BE YOU!
"Quarantining someone for being Christian on Easter Sunday?"
JFC YOU SOUND LIKE 'YOUR' KING MORE EACH DAY. NOT A COMPLIMENT!
